title: Bone Breaking Sound Effect Pack
description: Do you like kung fu movies or fist fights where bones are breaking? I guarantee you’ll get your dose here !
longDescription:
Bone Breaking Sound Effect Pack by Debsound


Audio demo: https://soundcloud.com/deb-sound-com/bone-breaking-sound-effect-pack-unreal-marketplace

More Info : Debsound


Do you like kung fu movies or fist fights where bones are breaking?

I guarantee you’ll get your dose here!


This sound effect collection is ideal for use in game software, applications, commercials, movies, TV shows,

videos, animation, and any other entertainment industry where a high-quality audio effect is essential.


I have always loved kung-fu, fighting, action movies and games so there was no question that when I started working with sounds I would make such sounds. Even though these are not real broken bone recordings, they can be used perfectly if you are thinking about a Stephen Seagal elbow fracture or a Mortal Kombat skull bone crush in connection with your production.

Some of them are painful even for me to listen to.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  110 Bone Breaking Sound Effect.
  •  An excellent choice for fighting, bone breaking productions.
  • Sound files is 3 variation: Long, Medium and Short.

Number of Audio Waves: 110

Number of Audio Cues: 110

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 03min 09sec

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation and Audio Demo: https://soundcloud.com/deb-sound-com/bone-breaking-sound-effect-pack-unreal-marketplace
